info.name: Account_X API Collection
info.description: Complete API collection for Account_X application with Enterprise-Grade Security, Automatic Tenant System, Authentication, Accounting, GST, CFO, CA, System, and Integrations modules. Features comprehensive security measures including XSS protection, SQL injection prevention, input sanitization, security audit logging, and multi-tenant data isolation.

request.description: Create a new admin user with strong password validation. Tenant will be auto-generated with all roles. Password must meet security requirements: 8+ chars, uppercase, lowercase, number, special char.

Create a new user with specific role and strong password validation. Available roles: Admin, Accountant, Viewer, cfo, finance-manager, finance-analyst, gst-manager, gst-operator, ca-manager, ca-operator. Password must meet security requirements.

Authenticate user and get JWT token with enhanced security. For admin users without tenant, tenant will be auto-generated and Admin role will be assigned. All login attempts are logged for security monitoring.

Get all available roles for the current tenant
